wikipedia_page.main: David Rowe (born 2 March 1944) is a former British international cyclist. He competed in the tandem event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. He also represented England in the 1,000 metres match sprint, at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland.
